creditline: The Christina N. and Swan J. Turnblad Memorial Fund and the Donald McNeely Family Fund in tribute to Marjorie McNeely
inscription: inscription brushed on the top right corner: “Landscape after Jiang Guanda’s Distant Mountains and Caverns shrouded by Mist, painted in the winter of the year jiyou [1669], Wang Jian 己酉冬日仿江貫道煙浮遠岫，王鑑”
markings: square red collector’s seal in the lower right corner: “Yanshan houren yan’shan 弇山後人”
medium: Hanging scroll, ink and color on paper
signed: three red artist’s seals in TR: “Laiyung guan 來雲館”, “Yuanzhao 員照”, and “Ranxiang’an zhu 染香庵主”;
title: Landscape
